Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
1:20 PM: The Gondola and Snow Bowl Express are now on wind hold.

12/17 - 6:20AM: Top of the morning, Stratton! For your Wednesday, youll be skiing and riding down 61 open trails spanning across 338 skiable acres. Of which, 46 trails have been grasicouly groomed overnight. Alongside 7 lifts will take you up the mountain starting at 9AM with possible delays due to high winds. Temps are warming up with a high of 28 degrees at the summit today, so go for that mid-weight layer over the heavy-weight. Have fun, play safe and we'll see ya on the slopes! 

We enjoyed having the Sun Bowl open for the weekend and offering some stellar powder skiing! Unfortunately, the Sun Bowl trails have very little base and we feel it is best to close those trails for this coming week. The good news is that Black Bear is now open, knowing it can hold up to the lower weekday skier and rider traffic. 

Lodging deal Alert! Founders Lodge is now 40% off until December 22! So what are you waiting for BOOK NOW for your best winter trip yet!

Safety Tip: Vermont state law requires you to put your safety bar down when on the lift. Plus, please take off your backpack before getting on the lift! 

Want to go on an adventure of a lifetime? Well, you're in luck, our Guided Snowmobile Tours are back! Explore Stratton after hours with friends and family on a tour to the summit. Be sure to book your spot now to guarantee it.

The Nordic Center is now open for Nordic Skiing and Snowshoeing! Enjoy the peaceful 10km of trails with friends or family.  

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: 1:20 PM: The Gondola and Snow Bowl Express are now on wind hold.
